name: Dark Saltybet
description:
Unofficial dark version for saltybet.com -- includes various "improvements" to the site styles on top of the dark base.

1500px+ window width recommended for best results.
additional_info:
v1.4 -- Fixed Firefox style issues.
v1.3 -- Highlight Saltybet chat messages.
v1.2 -- Improvements to tables.
v1.1 -- Positioning fixes + table fixes.
v1.0 -- Initial release.
